option.value: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <?import javafx.scene.control.Button?> <?import javafx.scene.control.TextArea?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane?> <?import javafx.scene.text.Font?> <AnchorPane xmlns="http://javafx.com/javafx/25" xmlns:fx="http://javafx.com/fxml/1" fx:controller="com.example._207103_project.WelcomeController" prefWidth="600.0" prefHeight="400.0"> <children> <TextArea id="WelcomeText" editable="false" layoutX="13.0" layoutY="42.0" prefHeight="200.0" prefWidth="661.0" text="Welcome to CV Builder"> <font> <Font size="55.0" /> </font> </TextArea> <Button fx:id="create" layoutX="75.0" layoutY="271.0" mnemonicParsing="false" onAction="#createClicked" prefHeight="51.0" prefWidth="209.0" style="-fx-background-color: yellow;" text="Create Your CV" textAlignment="CENTER" textFill="#f86300"> <font> <Font size="20.0" /> </font> </Button> <Button fx:id="explore" layoutX="395.0" layoutY="271.0" mnemonicParsing="false" onAction="#exploreClicked" prefHeight="51.0" prefWidth="209.0" style="-fx-background-color: #3b82f6;" text="Explore Saved CVs" textAlignment="CENTER" textFill="white"> <font> <Font size="20.0" /> </font> </Button> </children> </AnchorPane>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <?import javafx.geometry.Insets?> <?import javafx.scene.control.Button?> <?import javafx.scene.control.Label?> <?import javafx.scene.control.ScrollPane?> <?import javafx.scene.control.TextArea?> <?import javafx.scene.control.TextField?> <?import javafx.scene.image.ImageView?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.BorderPane?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.ColumnConstraints?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.GridPane?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.HBox?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.RowConstraints?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.VBox?> <?import javafx.scene.text.Font?> <BorderPane xmlns="http://javafx.com/javafx/25" xmlns:fx="http://javafx.com/fxml/1" fx:controller="com.example._207103_project.CreateController" prefHeight="900.0" prefWidth="700.0"> <top> <Label text="Create CV" textAlignment="CENTER" textFill="RED" underline="true" BorderPane.alignment="CENTER"> <font> <Font name="System Bold Italic" size="24.0" /> </font> <padding> <Insets bottom="12.0" left="12.0" right="12.0" top="12.0" /> </padding> </Label> </top> <padding> <Insets bottom="12.0" left="12.0" right="12.0" top="12.0" /> </padding> <center> <ScrollPane prefHeight="678.0" prefWidth="676.0" BorderPane.alignment="CENTER"> <content> <VBox prefHeight="655.0" prefWidth="661.0" spacing="12"> <children> <GridPane hgap="10.0" vgap="8.0"> <columnConstraints> <ColumnConstraints hgrow="SOMETIMES" prefWidth="139.0" /> <ColumnConstraints hgrow="SOMETIMES" prefWidth="502.0" /> </columnConstraints> <rowConstraints> <RowConstraints prefHeight="30.0" /> <RowConstraints prefHeight="30.0" /> <RowConstraints prefHeight="31.0" /> <RowConstraints /> </rowConstraints> <children> <Label text="Full Name:" GridPane.rowIndex="0"> <font><Font size="18.0"/></font> </Label> <Label text="Email:" GridPane.rowIndex="1"> <font><Font size="18.0"/></font> </Label> <Label text="Phone:" GridPane.rowIndex="2"> <font><Font size="18.0"/></font> </Label> <Label text="Address:" GridPane.rowIndex="3"> <font><Font size="18.0"/></font> </Label> <TextField fx:id="name" promptText="Enter Your Full Name" GridPane.columnIndex="1" GridPane.rowIndex="0"> <font><Font size="14.0"/></font> </TextField> <TextField fx:id="email" promptText="Enter Email" GridPane.columnIndex="1" GridPane.rowIndex="1"> <font><Font size="14.0"/></font> </TextField> <TextField fx:id="phone" promptText="Enter Phone" GridPane.columnIndex="1" GridPane.rowIndex="2"> <font><Font size="14.0"/></font> </TextField> <TextField fx:id="address" prefHeight="80.0" promptText="Enter Address" GridPane.columnIndex="1" GridPane.rowIndex="3"> <font><Font size="14.0"/></font> </TextField> </children> <padding> <Insets bottom="5.0" left="5.0" right="5.0" top="10.0" /> </padding> </GridPane> <HBox spacing="12"> <children> <VBox spacing="6"> <Label text="Photo"/> <ImageView fx:id="photoView" fitHeight="120" fitWidth="120" preserveRatio="true"/> </VBox> <VBox spacing="6"> <Label text="Upload Photo"/> <Button fx:id="choosePhotoButton" text="Choose Photo" onAction="#onChoosePhoto"/> </VBox> </children> <padding> <Insets top="6" right="6" bottom="6" left="6"/> </padding> </HBox> <VBox> <Label text="Educational Qualifications:"/> <TextArea fx:id="education" prefHeight="120.0" promptText="Enter Educational Qualifications (one per line)"/> </VBox> <VBox> <Label text="Skills:"/> <TextArea fx:id="skill" prefHeight="60.0" promptText="Comma or newline separated"/> </VBox> <VBox> <Label text="Projects:"/> <TextArea fx:id="project" prefHeight="60.0" promptText="One per line"/> </VBox> <VBox> <Label text="Work Experience:"/> <TextArea fx:id="work" prefHeight="90.0" promptText="One per line"/> </VBox> </children> <padding> <Insets top="10" right="10" bottom="10" left="10"/> </padding> </VBox> </content> </ScrollPane> </center> <bottom> <HBox alignment="TOP_CENTER" spacing="15.0" BorderPane.alignment="CENTER"> <children> <VBox alignment="CENTER" spacing="12.0"> <children> <Button fx:id="generateButton" onAction="#onGenerate" prefHeight="56.0" prefWidth="166.0" style="-fx-background-color: green;" text="Generate CV" textFill="#f7f7f7"> <font><Font name="System Bold" size="22.0"/></font> <padding><Insets top="12" right="12" bottom="12" left="12"/></padding> </Button> <Button fx:id="backButton" onAction="#backToWelcome" style="-fx-background-color: red;" text="Back" textFill="WHITE"/> </children> </VBox> </children> <padding> <Insets bottom="12.0" left="12.0" right="12.0" top="8.0" /> </padding> </HBox> </bottom> </BorderPane>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <?import javafx.geometry.Insets?> <?import javafx.scene.control.Button?> <?import javafx.scene.control.Label?> <?import javafx.scene.control.ScrollPane?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.BorderPane?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.HBox?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.VBox?> <?import javafx.scene.text.Font?> <BorderPane xmlns="http://javafx.com/javafx/25" xmlns:fx="http://javafx.com/fxml/1" fx:controller="com.example._207103_project.ExploreController" prefWidth="700.0" prefHeight="600.0" style="-fx-background-color: #f3f4f6;"> <top> <VBox spacing="10" BorderPane.alignment="CENTER"> <children> <Label text="Explore Saved CVs" textAlignment="CENTER" textFill="#0b4f6c"> <font> <Font name="System Bold" size="28.0" /> </font> </Label> <Label text="View and manage your saved curriculum vitae" textAlignment="CENTER" textFill="#64748b"> <font> <Font size="14.0" /> </font> </Label> </children> <padding> <Insets top="20" right="20" bottom="10" left="20" /> </padding> </VBox> </top> <center> <ScrollPane fitToWidth="true" style="-fx-background:transparent; -fx-background-color:transparent;" BorderPane.alignment="CENTER"> <content> <VBox fx:id="cvListContainer" spacing="12" style="-fx-padding:20;"> </VBox> </content> </ScrollPane> </center> <bottom> <HBox alignment="CENTER" spacing="12" BorderPane.alignment="CENTER"> <children> <Button text="Back to Home" onAction="#backToWelcome" style="-fx-background-color:#64748b; -fx-text-fill:white; -fx-font-weight:bold; -fx-background-radius:6; -fx-padding:10 20 10 20;"> <font> <Font size="14.0" /> </font> </Button> </children> <padding> <Insets top="12" right="12" bottom="16" left="12" /> </padding> </HBox> </bottom> </BorderPane>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <?import javafx.geometry.Insets?> <?import javafx.scene.control.*?> <?import javafx.scene.image.ImageView?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.*?> <?import javafx.scene.text.Font?> <BorderPane xmlns="http://javafx.com/javafx/25" xmlns:fx="http://javafx.com/fxml/1" fx:controller="com.example._207103_project.PreviewController" prefWidth="700.0" prefHeight="900.0" style="-fx-background-color: #f3f4f6;"> <top> <Label text="Curriculum Vitae" textAlignment="CENTER" textFill="#0b4f6c" underline="false" BorderPane.alignment="CENTER"> <font><Font name="System Bold Italic" size="26.0"/></font> <padding><Insets top="16" right="16" bottom="8" left="16"/></padding> </Label> </top> <padding><Insets top="12" right="12" bottom="12" left="12"/></padding> <center> <ScrollPane prefWidth="680" prefHeight="780" BorderPane.alignment="CENTER" fitToWidth="true" style="-fx-background:transparent; -fx-background-color:transparent;"> <content> <VBox prefWidth="660" spacing="14" alignment="TOP_CENTER"> <children> <VBox spacing="12" style="-fx-background-color: white; -fx-background-radius: 8; -fx-effect: dropshadow(gaussian, rgba(0,0,0,0.12), 10,0,0,4); -fx-padding:18;"> <children> <HBox spacing="14" alignment="CENTER_LEFT"> <ImageView fx:id="previewPhoto" fitWidth="120" fitHeight="120" preserveRatio="true" style="-fx-background-color: #e6eef3; -fx-background-radius:6; -fx-padding:4;"/> <VBox spacing="6"> <Label fx:id="nameLabel" style="-fx-font-size:22px; -fx-font-weight:bold; -fx-text-fill:#0b3a4a;"/> <Label fx:id="contactLabel" style="-fx-font-size:13px; -fx-text-fill:#475569;"/> </VBox> <Region HBox.hgrow="ALWAYS"/> </HBox> <Separator style="-fx-background-color: transparent; -fx-border-color: #e6eef3; -fx-border-width: 1 0 0 0;"/> <VBox spacing="10" style="-fx-padding:8 0 0 0;"> <Label text="Education" style="-fx-font-size:16px; -fx-font-weight:bold; -fx-text-fill:#0b4f6c;"/> <VBox fx:id="educationBox" spacing="6" style="-fx-padding:6 10 6 10;"/> </VBox> <VBox spacing="10" style="-fx-padding:6 0 0 0;"> <Label text="Skills" style="-fx-font-size:16px; -fx-font-weight:bold; -fx-text-fill:#0b4f6c;"/> <FlowPane fx:id="skillsBox" hgap="8" vgap="8" style="-fx-padding:6 10 6 10;"/> </VBox> <VBox spacing="10" style="-fx-padding:6 0 0 0;"> <Label text="Work Experience" style="-fx-font-size:16px; -fx-font-weight:bold; -fx-text-fill:#0b4f6c;"/> <VBox fx:id="experienceBox" spacing="6" style="-fx-padding:6 10 6 10;"/> </VBox> <VBox spacing="10" style="-fx-padding:6 0 0 0;"> <Label text="Projects" style="-fx-font-size:16px; -fx-font-weight:bold; -fx-text-fill:#0b4f6c;"/> <VBox fx:id="projectsBox" spacing="6" style="-fx-padding:6 10 6 10;"/> </VBox> </children> </VBox> </children> <padding><Insets top="10" right="10" bottom="10" left="10"/></padding> </VBox> </content> </ScrollPane> </center> <bottom> <HBox alignment="CENTER" spacing="12" BorderPane.alignment="CENTER"> <children> <Button text="Back" onAction="#backToCreate" style="-fx-background-color:#ef4444; -fx-text-fill: white; -fx-font-weight:bold; -fx-background-radius:6; -fx-padding:8 12 8 12;"/> <Button text="Save to Database" onAction="#saveCV" style="-fx-background-color:#10b981; -fx-text-fill: white; -fx-font-weight:bold; -fx-background-radius:6; -fx-padding:8 12 8 12;"/> </children> <padding><Insets top="8" right="12" bottom="12" left="12"/></padding> </HBox> </bottom> </BorderPane>
